<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete User Role</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/user/role/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a user role with the specified ID.

## Request

successful operation

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

invalid_id / cannot_delete_role_users_associated / invalid_id

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"403"} value={"403"}><div>

unauthorized_access

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
